mapper.select:
select er.id, er.expense_name, er.expense_type_parent, er.expense_type, er.region, er.dev_desc, er.purchase_channel, er.unit_price, er.count, er.mark_date, er.use_date, er.mark_user, er.apply_user, er.comment, er.submit_type, er.place, er.end_date, er.start_date, er.active_name, er.sum_price, er.resource_id, er.create_by, er.create_time, er.update_by, er.update_time, u.user_name apply_user_name, rt.name expense_type_name from xz_expense_record er left join sys_user u on u.user_id= er.apply_user left join xz_resource_type rt on rt.id=er.expense_type left join xz_resource_type xrt on xrt.id=er.expense_type_parent
and rt.id = #{expenseType} and xrt.id = #{expenseTypeParent} and er.expense_name like concat('%' ,#{expenseName} ,'%') and er.region = #{region} and u.user_name like concat('%' ,#{applyUserName} ,'%') and er.use_date = #{useDate} and month (er.use_date) = #{month}
AND date_format(er.use_date,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{params.beginTime},'%y%m%d')
AND date_format(er.use_date,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{params.endTime},'%y%m%d')
ORDER BY er.use_date DESC

select er.id, er.expense_name, er.expense_type_parent, er.expense_type, er.region, er.dev_desc, er.purchase_channel, er.unit_price, er.count, er.mark_date, er.use_date, er.mark_user, er.apply_user, er.comment, er.submit_type, er.place, er.end_date, er.start_date, er.active_name, er.sum_price, er.resource_id, er.create_by, er.create_time, er.update_by, er.update_time, u.user_name apply_user_name, rt.name expense_type_name from xz_expense_record er left join sys_user u on u.user_id= er.apply_user left join xz_resource_type rt on rt.id=er.expense_type left join xz_resource_type xrt on xrt.id=er.expense_type_parent where er.id = #{id}
